languages.text: {n}Надменный голос перерастает в звериный хрип.{/n} "Когда ты падешь, я отыщу твою душу в варпе и освежую от шкуры высокомерия и незнания, в которую ты облек{mf||ла} себя".

{n}The sorcerer's disdainful voice deteriorates into a feral rasp.{/n} "When you fall, I will find your soul in the warp and flay it clean of this cloak of arrogance and obtuseness you have wrapped yourself in."
languages.original_text: {n}Надменный голос перерастает в звериный хрип.{/n} "Когда ты падешь, я отыщу твою душу в варпе и освежую от шкуры высокомерия и незнания, в которую ты облек{mf||ла} себя".

traits.locale_text: {n}The sorcerer's disdainful voice deteriorates into a feral wheeze.{/n} "When you fall, I will find your soul in the warp and flay it clean of this cloak of arrogance and obtuseness you have wrapped yourself in."

{n}The sorcerer's disdainful voice deteriorates into a feral wheeze.{/n} "When you fall, I will find your soul in the warp and flay it clean of this cloak of arrogance and obtuseness you have wrapped yourself in."

{n}The sorcerer's disdainful voice deteriorates into a feral wheeze.{/n} "When you fall, I will find your soul in the warp and flay it clean of this cloak of arrogance and obtuseness you have wrapped yourself in."

{n}The sorcerer's disdainful voice deteriorates into a feral rasp.{/n} "When you fall, I will find your soul in the warp and flay it clean of this cloak of arrogance and obtuseness you have wrapped yourself in."

{n}The sorcerer's disdainful voice deteriorates into a feral rasp.{/n} "When you fall, I will find your soul in the warp and flay it clean of this cloak of arrogance and obtuseness you have wrapped yourself in."

languages.text: {n}巫师不屑的声音变成了凶狠的咆哮。{/n}“等你死了之后，我会在亚空间找到你的灵魂，将它从你傲慢与愚昧的外壳中彻底剥下来。”
languages.original_text: {n}The sorcerer's disdainful voice deteriorates into a feral rasp.{/n} "When you fall, I will find your soul in the warp and flay it clean of this cloak of arrogance and obtuseness you have wrapped yourself in."

traits.locale_text: {n}巫师不屑的声音变成了凶狠的咆哮。{/n}“等你死了之后，我会在亚空间找到你的灵魂，将它从你傲慢与愚昧的外壳中彻底剥下来。”

languages.text: {n}La voix méprisante du sorcier se transforme en râle féroce.{/n} « Quand vous mourrez, j'irai trouver votre âme dans le Warp et je lui arracherai le voile d'arrogance et de bêtise dans lequel vous vous êtes {mf|enveloppé|enveloppée}. »
languages.original_text: {n}The sorcerer's disdainful voice deteriorates into a feral rasp.{/n} "When you fall, I will find your soul in the warp and flay it clean of this cloak of arrogance and obtuseness you have wrapped yourself in."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix méprisante du sorcier se transforme en sifflement féroce.{/n} « Quand vous mourrez, j'irai trouver votre âme dans le Warp et je lui arracherai ce voile d'arrogance et de bêtise dans lequel vous vous êtes {mf|enveloppé|enveloppée}. »

languages.text: {n}ソーサラーの尊大な声が凶暴な唸り声へと変化する。{/n}「貴様が倒れたとき、俺は<歪み>の中から貴様の魂を見つけ出して、その傲慢さと鈍さを剥ぎ取ってやる」
languages.original_text: {n}The sorcerer's disdainful voice deteriorates into a feral rasp.{/n} "When you fall, I will find your soul in the warp and flay it clean of this cloak of arrogance and obtuseness you have wrapped yourself in."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソーサラーの尊大な声が凶暴な喘ぎ声へと変化する。{/n}「貴様が倒れたとき、俺は<歪み>の中から貴様の魂を見つけ出して、その傲慢さと鈍さを剥ぎ取ってやる」

languages.text: {n}La desdeñosa voz del hechicero se vuelve ronca y salvaje.{/n} «Cuando acabe contigo, encontraré tu alma en la disformidad y la desollaré para librarte del manto de arrogancia y obstinación que la cubre».
languages.original_text: {n}The sorcerer's disdainful voice deteriorates into a feral rasp.{/n} "When you fall, I will find your soul in the warp and flay it clean of this cloak of arrogance and obtuseness you have wrapped yourself in."

traits.locale_text: {n}La desdeñosa voz del hechicero da paso a un jadeo salvaje.{/n} «Cuando acabe contigo, encontraré tu alma en la disformidad y la desollaré para librarte del manto de arrogancia y obstinación que la cubre».

languages.text: {n}Die verächtliche Stimme des Hexers verkommt zu einem animalischen Keuchen.{/n} "Wenn Ihr fallt, werde ich Eure Seele im Warp finden und diesen Mantel der Arroganz und Stumpfheit abschälen, in den Ihr Euch gehüllt habt."
languages.original_text: {n}The sorcerer's disdainful voice deteriorates into a feral rasp.{/n} "When you fall, I will find your soul in the warp and flay it clean of this cloak of arrogance and obtuseness you have wrapped yourself in."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die verächtliche Stimme des Hexers verkommt zu einem animalischen Keuchen.{/n} "Wenn Ihr fallt, werde ich Eure Seele im Warp finden und diesen Mantel der Arroganz und Stumpfheit abschälen, in den Ihr Euch gehüllt habt."
